General.Name: Nexus AG
General.Description: Nexus AG develops and sells software solutions for the healthcare market worldwide. Its hospital information system and integrated diagnostic modules cover various functional requirements of hospitals, psychiatric institutions, rehabilitation facilities, and diagnostic centers. The company serves its customers through own locations, as well as certified dealers. NEXUS AG was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Donaueschingen, Germany.
